recipesJson.name: The best damn blueberry cheesecake
recipesJson.author: CGM
recipesJson.description:
This took me a while to perfect. But i have to give a shout out to @rdajunkie. I started with his recepie and over time ive been tweeking a little here and there and now we have this... 
Dont sub fw sweet cream. I know its gross and everyone hates it including me. But trust me it works here. 
The only thing im thinking about is bringing
The sugar cookie to 1% and adding tpa graham clear at 1%
Yes also your reading it right.  Bilberry at 1%.  I know that sounds risky or also gross. 
But again trust me. It works here.
Give this. Atleast a week. But after that its good to go. Hope you guys enjoy this. 
Up and coming mixer. Been doing this for bearly 3 months and ive had a lot of help from my friends (graham/diyordies producer) (lorenzo/blackdimondvapes) and (dasmoose/liquidantlers) Like comment share follow.

reviews.text: a week steeped, this is delicious.  Made a 30 and whipping up a 120 right now.  I've made a TON of blueberry recipes but this might be my favorite. Great job!
